TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Switch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个用于创建新的调试和跟踪开关的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class to create new debugging and tracing switches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交换机提供高效机制用于在运行时使用外部设置控制跟踪和调试输出。A switch provides an efficient mechanism for controlling tracing and debugging output at run time using external settings. 类实现对于开关，这样便可在运行时更改交换机级别的默认行为。The class implements default behavior for switches, allowing you to change the switch level at run time. 此类是基类，和类。This class is the base class for the , and the classes. 这些开关可满足大多数调试和跟踪需求。These switches meet most debugging and tracing needs. 关于跟踪开关的详细信息，请参阅[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). 必须启用跟踪或调试要使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅您的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，也可以添加标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用跟踪使用 C# 中，添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing using in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要设置你的交换机的级别，请编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your switch, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个开关并将其值设置、 删除开关，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 此示例配置节定义与属性设置为`mySwitch`并且值设置为`true`。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在应用程序中，可以使用已配置的开关值，通过创建具有相同的名称，如下面的代码示例中所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/remarks.cs#4)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个新类具有四个级别的跟踪可用于跟踪调用堆栈。The following example shows how to define a new class with four levels of tracing that can be used to trace a call stack. 可以使用以检测进入或退出应用程序来记录每次该方法的交换机。You can use the switch to instrument your application to log each time the method is entered or exited. 第一个示例创建用于设置开关级别的枚举。The first example creates the enumeration used to set the level of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 以下示例创建新的开关。The following example creates the new switch. 这段代码实现`Level`属性来设置新的开关的值。The code implements a `Level` property to set the value of the new switch. `Level` 调用受保护的属性，将值分配给该新开关。`Level` calls the protected property that assigns the value to the new switch. 此示例还实现两个取值函数属性，若要获取的交换机的分配的值。This example also implements two assessor properties to get the assigned value of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的示例创建一个新开关中的`Main`。The following example creates a new switch in `Main`. 它创建新的交换机，并为其指定值。It creates a new switch and assigns it a value. 然后，具体取决于交换机设置，它将输出调试消息进入和离开该方法。Then, depending on the switch settings, it outputs debugging messages for entering and leaving the method. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

para.span: 如果需要跟踪级别，或设置的机制切换不同于所提供的级别，并，可以继承自。

span.span: If you need trace levels, or mechanisms for setting switch levels different from those provided by , and , you can inherit from .

para.span: 从该类继承时，必须实现方法。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建一个新对象、 的值`displayName`参数用来查找初始交换机设置。When you create a new object, the value of the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 默认值为空字符串 ("")。The default value is an empty string (""). 在 XML 配置文件中，可以添加开关并将其值设置、 删除一个开关，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。Within the XML configuration file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 执行应用程序时，未检测到动态更改配置文件。Dynamic changes to the configuration file are not detected while the application is executing. 必须停止并重新启动应用程序，然后对配置文件的更改才会生效。You must stop and restart an application before changes to the configuration file take effect. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

para.span: 若要设置开关的值，设置构造函数中的属性。

span.span: To set the value of the switch, set the property in the constructor.

summary.span: 通过指定开关的显示名称、说明和默认值来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the display name, description, and default value for the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数用于设置的值属性，并`description`参数用于设置的值属性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. `defaultSwitchValue`参数是开关的值，如果由代码或配置文件属性未设置属性。The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is the value for the switch if the property is not set by code or by the configuration file attribute. 请参阅重载的其他信息。See the overload for additional information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取在应用程序配置文件中定义的自定义开关特性。

span.span: Gets the custom switch attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: 一个 ，包含跟踪开关的自定义特性（不区分大小写）。

span.span: A containing the case-insensitive custom attributes for the trace switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义特性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 未引用的自定义特性不会枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 继承的类类可以通过重写中添加自定义特性方法并返回自定义属性名称的字符串数组。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示自定义开关不可识别的属性。The following code sample shows how to display the unrecognized attributes for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a description of the switch.
The description of the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应指示开关的功能；例如，“为目录观察程序组件启用跟踪”。This property should indicate the function of the switch; for example, "Enables tracing for a directory watcher component." 此值由 `descriptor` 构造函数中的 参数设置。The value is set by the `descriptor` parameter in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 用于标识该开关的名称。

span.span: The name used to identify the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建一个新对象，查找初始交换机设置。When you create a new object, the finds initial switch settings. 有关详细信息，请参阅构造函数和[如何： 创建、 初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)Visual Studio 文档中。For more information, see the constructor and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示使用的跟踪源开关的显示名称。The following code example displays the display name for the switch in use by a trace source. 此代码示例是可在一个更大示例的一部分类摘要。This code example is part of a larger example that can be found in the class summary. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#10)]

abstract member GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[] override this.GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[]

summary.span: 获取开关支持的自定义特性。

span.span: Gets the custom attributes supported by the switch.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，包含开关所支持的自定义特性的名称；如果该开关不支持任何自定义特性，则为 。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the custom attributes supported by the switch, or if there no custom attributes are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现方法将返回`null`。The default implementation for the method returns `null`. 如果在配置文件中添加一个开关，并且不包括在返回的字符串数组指定自定义属性、开关加载时引发。If a switch is added in a configuration file and custom attributes are specified that are not included in the string array returned by , a is thrown when the switch is loaded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法自定义开关。The following code sample shows an override of the method for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#34)]

para.span: 从继承时类或派生的类中，您可以重写方法以提供自定义特性类。

span.span: When inheriting from the class or a derived class, you can override the method to provide custom attributes for your class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当 属性更改时调用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交换机读取在首次调用值从配置文件，并再次在每次将开关的值更改的时调用。 is invoked the first time a switch reads the value from the configuration file and is invoked again each time the switch's value is changed.

abstract member OnValueChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnValueChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当 属性更改时调用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将新值的分析属性设置为一个整数值，它用于设置属性。The default implementation parses the new value of the property to an integer value which it uses to set the property.

para.span: 应重写此方法并将设置相应的转换你的交换机的值。

span.span: You should override this method and use a conversion that sets the appropriate value for your switch.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int SwitchSetting { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SwitchSetting : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此开关的当前设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current setting for this switch.
The current setting for this switch.
The default is zero.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Value : string with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the switch.

value.span: 一个表示开关的值的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the value of the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法的值属性更改。The method is called when the value of the property is changed. 方法分析此属性的值，并将其转换为整数值，然后将其用于设置属性。The method parses the value of this property and converts it to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.

span.span: The value is .
-or-

exception.span: 该值不是仅由一个可选负号后跟一系列从 0 到 9 的数字组成的。

span.span: The value does not consist solely of an optional negative sign followed by a sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
-or-

exception.span: 该值表示小于 或大于 的数字。

span.span: The value represents a number less than or greater than .

para.span: 应重写方法，并提供设置相应的转换运算你的交换机的值。

span.span: You should override the method and provide a conversion operation that sets the appropriate value for your switch.
